title: Initiating and responding tribunal of State
context: ยง576B-203 Initiating and responding tribunal of State. Under this chapter, a tribunal of this State may serve as an initiating tribunal to forward proceedings to a tribunal of another state, and as a responding tribunal for proceedings initiated in another state or a foreign country. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1]
